Articles.Content:
[IMG]http://www.nasa.gov/sites/default/files/thumbnails/image/cheshirecat.jpg[/IMG]



An interesting example I just had to share. ".. More things in heaven and Earth Horatio, than can be dreamt of in your philosophy."


[URL]http://www.nasa.gov/mission_pages/chandra/where-alice-in-wonderland-meets-albert-einstein.html[/URL]

They say it looks like the Cheshire Cat, but all I see is a purple Kool-Aid man. Oh yeah!

[IMG]https://ferrebeekeeper.files.wordpress.com/2013/10/makoolaid.jpg[/IMG] Edited November 24, 2015 by SuperFastJellyfish
